title: Bronze 2+ Ranked team, Looking for top, jungle, mid and adc
body:
Hi im in bronze 2 and am 15 and want to create a competitive ranked team with people and climb the ranks.

So im looking for Bronze 2+ Preferably Bronze 2 and 1's.
Looking for people around the same age as me.

Please fill this out.

Summoner Name:
Skype:
Age:
Amount of time available:

age 33
prefer : top or jungle, support
